column2: Sac'd due to labored breathing; lethargic disposition; T1--located on right ear; T2--located over left eye
DCT-TVA; Braf ca; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, heart, lungs, kidney, spleen, liver, tumor
Sac'd due to labored breathing; lethargic disposition; T1--located on right ear; T2--located over left eye
Brain and skull were both in tact.
Large tumor located inside chest cavity--retained with lungs during necropsy. Lungs also appeared to be much smaller than normal.
1 cryogenic and 1 cell line attempted for tumor 1; T2 was too small to attempt any cryogenics or cell lines.
